item.title: New OnePlus Pad makes a surprise debut in China with MediaTek chip - 9to5Google
item.description:
New OnePlus Pad makes a surprise debut in China with MediaTek chip

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: 9to5Google

OnePlus has revealed a new tablet in China, featuring MediaTek's latest Dimensity 8350 chipset and an 11.6-inch high-resolution display.

  • The OnePlus Pad comes with a 2.8K display with a refresh rate of 144Hz.
  • Internally powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350, it offers configurations with either 8GB or 12GB of RAM.
  • The tablet has a robust 9,520mAh battery with 67W fast charging capabilities.
  • Priced at CNY 1,999 (approximately $274), it aims to be a budget-friendly device.
  • This launch is positioned as a rebranded version of the Oppo Pad 3, demonstrating the close collaboration between OnePlus and Oppo.
“The Oppo Pad 3 was the first tablet to come equipped with the new Dimensity chip, which has slightly more power than the Dimensity 8300.”

Overall, the new OnePlus Pad stands out with competitive specifications in the budget category, although it may remain exclusive to the Chinese market for now.

item.title: OnePlus Open 2 leak alleges refined design, early 2025 release - 9to5Google
item.description:
OnePlus Open 2 leak alleges refined design, early 2025 release

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: 9to5Google

The OnePlus Open is preparing for its sequel as leaks suggest an improved design and new features for the OnePlus Open 2, expected to be released in early 2025.

  • New design with refined elements and a smaller camera module.
  • Specifications may include Snapdragon 8 Elite, up to 16GB RAM, and 1TB storage.
  • Reportedly features an 8-inch inner display and a 6.4-inch cover display.
  • Improved battery of 5,900 mAh with 80W wired and 50W wireless charging.
  • Early release is anticipated around March 2025, possibly coinciding with MWC.
“The renders below are said to be based on a ‘late-stage prototype’ and show a design that’s mostly a refinement of the existing model.”

In conclusion, the OnePlus Open 2 promises to offer significant upgrades and is set to generate excitement in the foldable smartphone market.

item.title: Is Oppo planning to launch new Find N5 soon? Check out its specs, expected release date and more - DNA India
item.description:
Is Oppo planning to launch new Find N5 soon? Check out its specs, expected release date and more

Publication Date: Not specified Source: DNA India

While the exact date of its launch is yet to be confirmed, an Oppo official seemingly asserted that the phone would launch early next year.

  • Oppo's Executive Director revealed that the Find N5 would launch before the Find X8 Ultra.
  • The release is speculated to happen before the Chinese New Year on January 29, 2025.
  • The phone will be named Find N5 in China and OnePlus Open 2 in overseas markets.
  • The Find N5 is expected to compete with Samsung's foldable phones.
  • The upcoming model may feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, offering enhanced performance compared to its predecessors.
  • The camera is expected to have a similar or better setup than its predecessor, the Oppo Find N3.
  • It may include features like wireless magnetic charging and an IPX-8 water resistance rating.
“If the sales turn out to be a success, then the model will continue to give stiff competition to the Galaxy Z Fold 7.”

The Oppo Find N5 is shaping up as a promising competitor in the foldable phone market, with potential advanced features that could challenge existing models from competitors like Samsung.

item.title: OnePlus 13 vs Samsung Galaxy S25: Price In India, Launch Date, Specs And More - Times Now
item.description:
OnePlus 13 vs Samsung Galaxy S25: Price In India, Launch Date, Specs And More

Publication Date: Dec 27, 2024 | Source: Times Now

This article compares the upcoming OnePlus 13 and Samsung Galaxy S25, discussing their specifications, expected prices in India, and launch dates.

  • The OnePlus 13 features a 6.82-inch quad-curved OLED display with 1440p and 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Samsung Galaxy S25 is likely to come with a Dynamic AMOLED 2X LTPO display.
  • Camera on OnePlus 13 includes a Hasselblad triple-camera setup with three 50MP sensors.
  • Galaxy S25 may feature a 50MP primary camera alongside upgraded ultrawide and telephoto lenses.
  • OnePlus 13 runs on Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chip and ColorOS 15.
  • Galaxy S25 expected to use Snapdragon 8 Elite chip with One UI 7.1 based on Android 15.
  • Battery capacity: OnePlus 13 has 6000 mAh with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging; Galaxy S25 may have a 4000 mAh battery with 25W charging.
  • Expected launch price: OnePlus 13 Rs 67,000–70,000; Galaxy S25 starting at Rs 75,000.
  • OnePlus 13 is set to launch on January 7, 2024, while Galaxy S25 on January 22, 2025.
"The OnePlus 13 is expected to deliver powerful specs at a competitive price, while the Galaxy S25 continues Samsung's tradition of premium flagship devices."

Overall, the competition between OnePlus and Samsung in the premium smartphone market is intensifying, with both devices promising exciting features for consumers.

item.title: Infinix Note 50 Reportedly Spotted on FCC Database; Said to Support 45W Fast Charging - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Infinix Note 50 Reportedly Spotted on FCC Site; Design, Features Leaked

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Gadgets 360

The Infinix Note 50 could be released soon as a successor to the Infinix Note 40, with its design and features recently leaked on a certification website.

  • The Infinix Note 50 has been spotted with model number X6858 on the FCC certification site.
  • It features a rear camera setup with an octagonal design and four sensors.
  • The device supports 2G, 3G, and 4G LTE connectivity along with dual-band Wi-Fi.
  • It is expected to support up to 45W wired fast charging.
  • The lineup may include variants like Note 50X, Note 50 Pro, and Note 50 Pro+ 5G.
“More details about the vanilla Infinix Note 50 model alongside the rest of the anticipated lineup may surface online over the next few weeks.”

This imminent launch has generated interest among tech enthusiasts, with expectations for a range of variants in the Note 50 series.

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 Runs Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC, 16GB RAM - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4 Spotted on Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC

Date: Not specified Source: Gadgets360

The Redmi Turbo 4 is expected to launch early next year featuring the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC, as revealed by its Geekbench listing providing key specifications.

  • The Redmi Turbo 4 prototype has a single-core score of 1,649 and a multi-core score of 6,342.
  • It reportedly has 15GB of RAM and runs on Android 15.
  • The device features an octa-core chipset with a unique architecture.
  • It is anticipated to debut as a successor to the Redmi Turbo 3, which launched in China in April.
“The Turbo 4 handset will be unveiled early next year as the first phone with the new MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC.”

The Redmi Turbo 4 is also rumored to be offered internationally as the Poco X7 Pro, although the Turbo 3 has not been released outside China yet.

item.title: WhatsApp Introduces Document Scanning Feature, But Only For iPhone Users For Now - News18
item.description:
WhatsApp Introduces Document Scanning Feature Exclusively for iPhone Users

Date: December 27, 2024

Source: News18

WhatsApp has rolled out a new document scanning feature for its iOS users, eliminating the need for third-party apps for document scanning, with plans to extend it to Android users soon.

  • The new feature allows users to scan documents directly within WhatsApp, enhancing the user experience.
  • Users must update to the latest version of WhatsApp to access this feature.
  • The feature works by opening a chat, selecting ‘Documents’, and then scanning directly from the app.
“This feature is especially useful for those who want to share files quickly while on the go.”

WhatsApp continues to innovate with features that cater to its vast user base, further enhancing the platform's functionality.

item.title: Poco M7 Pro 5G Review - A Value Champ That Delivers! - Times Now
item.description:
Poco M7 Pro 5G Review - A Value Champ That Delivers!

Publication Date: October 2023   Source: Tech News Now

Poco has launched the M7 Pro 5G, positioning it as the most affordable 5G phone with an OLED display at a price of Rs 14,999. The review delves into its design, camera capabilities, performance, and overall value compared to competitors.

  • 6.67-inch AMOLED display with up to 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by a Mediatek Dimensity 7025 Ultra chip.
  • Camera specs include a 50MP primary, 2MP secondary, and 20MP front-facing camera.
  • Battery life of 5110mAh with 45W fast charging.
  • Offers a combination of good design, long-lasting performance, and competitive pricing.
“The Poco M7 Pro is like that friend who shows up with amazing food at a potluck—you didn't know you needed them, but you're suddenly very glad they're there.”

In conclusion, the Poco M7 Pro 5G is a strong contender in the budget smartphone market, offering impressive features, great camera performance, and solid battery life, making it a worthwhile option for consumers.

item.title: 2024’s best games channeled the heart and soul of the ‘90s - The Verge
item.description:
2024's Best Games Capture the Spirit of the '90s

Publication Date: October 2024 | Source: The Verge

In 2024, gaming saw a revival with titles such as Metaphor: ReFantazio, Astro Bot, and Balatro harkening back to the gaming innovations of the late '90s. These games succeeded by merging nostalgic formats with modern gaming trends, indicating potential paths for revitalizing the industry amidst recent struggles.

  • Classic genres were reimagined with fresh mechanics, leading to critical acclaim and commercial success.
  • Capcom excelled with a mix of heavy hitters and indie-style games, proving that both can coexist profitably.
  • Balatro simplified roguelike systems by incorporating the universally familiar game of poker, broadening its appeal.
  • Astro Bot celebrated nostalgia with a mascot platforming experience reminiscent of early Sony titles.
  • The success of these games suggests a shift in industry focus toward unique experiences over costly mega-projects.
“If the big publishers want to staunch the bleeding of the last two miserable years, they could take the lessons Capcom, Balatro, Metaphor, and Astro Bot provide.”

The return to classic gaming formats and innovative gameplay not only appeals to nostalgia but also highlights a viable business strategy for developers in a changing market.

item.title: iQoo Z9 Turbo Endurance Edition with 6,400mAh battery to launch in January 2025 - India TV News
item.description:
iQoo Z9 Turbo Endurance Edition Set to Launch with Massive 6,400mAh Battery in January 2025

Publication Date: December 27, 2024
Source: India TV News

iQoo is set to introduce the Z9 Turbo Endurance Edition in India with a larger 6,400mAh battery, enhancing battery life while maintaining key specifications from the original model.

  • Features a significant battery upgrade to 6,400mAh for extended usage.
  • Retains performance with Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset.
  • Adopts a sleek design using silicon-carbon anode battery technology.
  • Sports a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with Full HD+ and 144Hz refresh rate.
  • Camera system includes a 50MP primary sensor and 8MP ultrawide lens.
  • Supports 80W wired fast charging for quick power-ups.
  • Expected launch in India next month, with pre-orders starting in China.
“The Endurance Edition will adopt a slim design, thanks to the inclusion of a silicon-carbon anode battery.”

The iQoo Z9 Turbo Endurance Edition promises significant enhancements in battery life and performance, making it a compelling choice for power users.

item.title: Buy iPhone 15 for Rs 30,000 less: Flipkart’s Big Saving Days ends tonight! - India TV News
item.description:
Buy iPhone 15 for Rs 30,000 less: Flipkart’s Big Saving Days ends tonight!

Publication Date: August 27, 2024

Source: India TV News

Flipkart’s Big Saving Days Sale has been extended till today, giving buyers a last chance to get the iPhone 15 at its lowest-ever price.

  • iPhone 15 now available at a starting price of Rs 49,999 after a Rs 30,000 discount.
  • Initial price was Rs 69,999, with additional discounts following the launch of the iPhone 16.
  • EMI plans available starting at Rs 2,110.
  • Key iPhone 15 Features:
    • Display: 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR with Dynamic Island.
    • Performance: A16 Bionic chipset.
    • Cameras: 48MP main camera, 12MP secondary and selfie cameras.
    • Connectivity: 5G support.

This is the final chance for buyers to secure this exceptional price before the sale ends tonight at 11:59 PM.

item.title: GTA 6 trailer 2 release theory stirs up after GTA 5 actor Ned Luke's cryptic post - Sportskeeda
item.description:
GTA 6 Trailer 2 Release Speculation Grows with Ned Luke's Cryptic Tweet

Publication Date: December 27, 2024
Source: Sportskeeda

Several Grand Theft Auto fans are anticipating December 27, 2024, as a potential release date for the second GTA 6 trailer based on new fan theories that have emerged.

  • Ned Luke, the actor who portrayed Michael in GTA 5, tweeted “December 27th” with five stars, leading to speculation.
  • While some fans find the tweet humorous, others doubt that details about the game would be disclosed so soon.
  • Rockstar Games has yet to confirm any new content, leading to a mix of excitement and skepticism among fans.
  • Fans have interpreted Luke's tweet as possibly alluding to the second trailer’s release, though no official announcement has been made.
  • Some updates and screenshots related to GTA 6 may also be revealed instead of a trailer, but confirmation is lacking.
“Take such rumors with a grain of salt.”

In conclusion, while fans are eagerly speculating about potential releases related to GTA 6, official updates from Rockstar Games remain pending, and it's crucial for the community to exercise caution with their expectations.

item.title: Underground Hydrogen Reserves Could Power Earth for 200 Years, Study Finds - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Hydrogen Reserves Hidden Underground Could Power Earth for Two Centuries

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Gadgets 360

A vast reserve of hydrogen gas buried beneath Earth's crust has been estimated to hold trillions of tons of this clean energy source. Scientists suggest that even a small portion of this hidden hydrogen could meet global energy needs for the next 200 years, potentially reducing the dependence on fossil fuels.

Key Points

  • Estimated 6.2 trillion tons of hydrogen potentially trapped underground, vastly exceeding oil reserves.
  • A mere 2 percent of these hydrogen stocks could supply sufficient energy for global carbon neutrality for two centuries.
  • Natural hydrogen is produced through geological processes, reducing the need for energy-intensive storage systems.
  • Challenges remain in determining exact locations of underground hydrogen deposits, with estimates ranging widely.
“A mere 2 percent of these hydrogen stocks could supply sufficient energy to achieve global carbon neutrality for approximately two centuries.” - Geoffrey Ellis, USGS

Natural hydrogen could transform global energy systems, with research ongoing to identify viable reserves.

item.title: Peter Dohyung Lee, OPPO India, discusses company’s journey, Find X8 series, and future plans - Mint
item.description:
Peter Dohyung Lee Discusses OPPO India's Journey and the Find X8 Series

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: Mint

In this interview, Peter Dohyung Lee, Head of Product Strategy at OPPO India, discusses the company’s commitment to innovation in the Indian smartphone market, celebrating its 10th anniversary, and the introduction of the Find X8 series.

  • OPPO India has become a leading smartphone brand with a focus on introducing innovative technologies.
  • India is a priority market for OPPO, with significant growth in the premium smartphone segment.
  • The Find X8 series showcases features such as a quad-camera system, AI Telescope Zoom, and the MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chipset.
  • OPPO aims to make AI-driven smartphones accessible to 50 million users this year.
“India is one of the fastest-growing smartphone markets in the world.” - Peter Dohyung Lee

In conclusion, OPPO is committed to leading in the premium smartphone market by innovating alongside industry leaders.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Can Be Yours For Just Rs 69,599: Here’s How To Get The Deal - Times Now
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Can Be Yours For Just Rs 69,599: Here’s How To Get The Deal

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: The Times of India

The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G is now available at a discounted price of Rs 69,599 on Flipkart, down from its original price of Rs 1,34,999, thanks to attractive exchange and bank offers.

  • The S24 Ultra offers premium features including a titanium body and advanced camera system.
  • Trade-in offers can provide up to Rs 40,400 discount when exchanging a Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra.
  • HDFC Bank credit card users can receive an additional Rs 12,000 discount.
  • Specifications include Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, a new 50MP telephoto lens, and a 5,000mAh battery.
“Flipkart has made the S24 Ultra an unbeatable proposition for those eyeing a flagship smartphone upgrade.”

This price drop on the Galaxy S24 Ultra offers a remarkable opportunity for tech enthusiasts looking to upgrade their devices at a substantial discount.

item.title: Oppo teases design ahead of Reno 13 Series India launch | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Oppo teases design ahead of Reno 13 Series India launch

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

Oppo is generating excitement for its upcoming Reno 13 series launch in India, expected in January 2025, by teasing key design features of the smartphones.

  • The Reno 13 series will likely include the Reno 13 and Reno 13 Pro models.
  • Distinctive camera setup with two large vertically aligned cameras and a third one on the side.
  • Available in white with a marble-like pattern and lavender color options.
  • Features a one-piece sculpted glass rear panel and an aluminum frame.
  • Expected specs include a 6.59-inch flat AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset, and a 5,600mAh battery.
  • Starting price in China is CNY 2,699 (around ₹31,400), expected to be similar in India.
"The white variant boasts a marble-like pattern, while both models feature a 'one piece sculpted glass' rear panel."

In conclusion, the Reno 13 series is anticipated to attract attention with its sleek design and robust specifications, appealing particularly to camera enthusiasts.

item.title: OnePlus Open 2 Alleged Renders Leak Showcasing Slimmer Design, Large Camera Module - Gadgets 360
item.description:
OnePlus Open 2 Early Renders Reveal Design and Specifications

Publication Date: Not specified. Source: Smartprix

The OnePlus Open 2, set to release early next year, reveals its design and specifications through leaked renders. This upcoming foldable smartphone is expected to feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and an IPX8 rating, showcasing a slim build with a larger camera module.

  • Expected to run on Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC.
  • Design features a larger circular rear camera module.
  • Boasts three rear sensors and Hasselblad branding.
  • Will likely have an 8-inch LTPO main display with 2K resolution.
  • Rumored specifications include 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of storage.
  • Expected to launch in international markets as OnePlus Open 2.
"The upcoming phone boasts three rear sensors on the top semicircle... It is likely to carry a 5,900mAh battery with 80W wired charging support."

The OnePlus Open 2 aims to elevate the foldable smartphone experience with upgraded specifications and a significant design enhancement.

item.title: OnePlus 13 Price Range in India Tipped; OnePlus 13R Said to Get Single RAM, Storage Variant - Gadgets 360
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Price Range and Features Leaked Ahead of Launch in India

Publication Date: January 6, 2024 Source: NDTV

The upcoming OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R are set to launch in India on January 7, with leaked price ranges and specifications revealing potential features and configurations for both models.

  • The OnePlus 13 is expected to be priced between Rs. 67,000 and Rs. 70,000.
  • Two RAM and storage options are predicted for the OnePlus 13.
  • The OnePlus 13R is likely to be a rebadged OnePlus Ace 5 and will feature a single RAM and storage configuration.
  • Both phones will be available in various color options and will be sold via Amazon and the OnePlus website.
  • They will be powered by Snapdragon processors along with 6,000mAh batteries, and AI capabilities for photo editing.
“The OnePlus 13 will also have IP68 and IP69 ratings against dust and water ingress.”

In conclusion, the launch of the OnePlus 13 series is highly anticipated with significant interest in their pricing and features.

item.title: Dragons, demons and Grand Theft Auto VI: the games to look out for in 2025 - The Guardian
item.description:
Dragons, demons and Grand Theft Auto VI: the games to look out for in 2025

Publication Date: Not specified; Source: Not specified

This article highlights the most anticipated video games set for release in 2025, featuring various genres and intriguing storylines.

  • Civilization VII - An overhaul of the classic strategy game, allowing players to choose between numerous leaders and civilizations for world domination.
  • Grand Theft Auto VI - Set in a fictionalized Miami with a female protagonist, this is highly awaited following the immense success of its predecessor.
  • Lost Records: Bloom & Rage - A narrative game exploring friendship and secrets, transitioning between past and present.
  • Monster Hunter Wilds - A new expansive entry in the dragon-slaying series by Capcom.
  • Atomfall - A cozy alternate history survival game set in post-apocalyptic Britain.
  • DOOM: The Dark Ages - An intense first-person shooter steeped in gothic aesthetics and medieval warfare against demonic forces.
  • Metroid Prime 4 - The long-anticipated continuation of the iconic Metroid series.
  • Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii - A humorous and silly action-adventure game featuring colorful characters.
  • Fable - A comic fantasy adventure hoping to revive the beloved but dormant series.
  • Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - A dark-fantasy game with a unique story involving supernatural elements in a devastated Paris.

item.title: The USB-C charging mandate arrives in the EU — here’s what that means - The Verge
item.description:
EU Mandates USB-C Charging for Devices Starting December 28th

Publication Date: December 2023 | Source: The Verge

Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge

The European Union is set to implement a directive mandating the use of USB-C charging ports for most electronic devices starting December 28, 2024. This directive aims to reduce e-waste and standardize charging solutions, improving consumer convenience.

  • The directive encompasses a wide range of devices including smartphones, tablets, and headphones.
  • Companies must ensure products sold in the EU are capable of charging via USB-C or risk being pulled from the market.
  • Regulations will also cover fast charging practices and encourage unbundling chargers from devices, reducing excess waste.
  • Exceptions apply to laptops and certain devices, with phased compliance timelines.
"The sheer breadth of this directive means its impact will be felt by both consumers and businesses."

As the EU enforces this directive, it could lead to significant industry changes, pushing for more sustainable practices and simplified charging solutions across the technology landscape.

item.title: 7 Foldable Phone Launches In 2025: OnePlus Open 2, Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold, Motorola Razr 60, More - NDTV Profit
item.description:
7 Foldable Phone Launches In 2025: OnePlus Open 2, Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold, Motorola Razr 60, More

Date: 27 Dec 2024 | Source: NDTV Profit Tech

2025 is set to be a significant year for foldable smartphones, with various innovative models from top manufacturers on the horizon.

  • OnePlus Open 2: A potential delay in its release, featuring major improvements and a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip.
  • Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold: Expected design focus with enhanced AI capabilities and superior camera features.
  • Samsung Tri-Fold Phone: Anticipated to create a larger display with a unique folding mechanism.
  • Motorola Razr 60: Promising improved specs compared to the previous series.
  • Tecno Phantom Ultimate 2: A tri-fold prototype with innovative display features and robust hinge durability.
  • Samsung Z Flip FE: Aiming to be Samsung's first affordable foldable phone with a design similar to the existing Z Flip models.
  • Oppo Tri-Fold Phone: Showcased with a unique dual-hinge design and a bezel-less display.
“We are considering ways to lower entry barriers so that more customers can actually experience foldable products, given the high satisfaction among existing foldable users.”

The upcoming launches signal a growing trend in the foldable smartphone market, promising enhanced features and broader accessibility for consumers in the near future.
